name: jQuery-filterList
body:
## Description Uses an input box to filter an unordered list in real-time. Open example.html for example usage. ## Required HTML
  • Item A

  • Item C
## Required JavaScript $('#filter').filterList(); ## Links * [Online Demo](http://travishorn.github.com/jquery-filterList)
tagline: Uses an input box to filter an unordered list in real-time.
